titles.title: He Is Lord! He Is Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He is Lord! He is Lord!
He is risen from the dead and He is Lord.
Every knee shall bow, every tongue confess,
That Jesus Christ is Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are Lord! You are Lord!
You are risen from the dead and You are Lord.
Every knee shall bow.
Every tongue confess, that Jesus Christ is Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We are one, we are one.
We are risen from the dead and we are one.
Every knee shall bow, every tongue confess,
That Christ has made us one.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Es Se単or, es Se単or!
Resucito de la muerte y es Se単or.
Toda rodilla se doblara y toda lengua confesara,
Que Cristo es Se単or.
